name: Space Surfin'
description:
Catch some space waves and go surfing for stars! Jump between floating bubbles of water, avoiding lasers and asteroids, to collect as many spinning stars as possible. If you fall - no problem - do a barrel roll to jump higher. The game gets harder the longer you play. How many stars can you collect? Shoot for a score that makes you think, "gnarly, like woah!"

Move with WASD or the arrow keys. Pause with space. Barrel roll with shift or ctrl.

Thanks for playing! Contact  me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
